trans-unit.source:
\n

Defines the types (or classes) of documents and the properties associated with those types.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx $xx xxxxxxx$ xx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
This field reads the Windows registry base key HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxxxx xxxxx xxx Xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxx XXXX$XXXXXXX$XXXX.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Contains configuration information pertaining to the hardware that is not specific to the user.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
This field reads the Windows registry base key HKEY_CURRENT_CONFIG.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxxxx xxxxx xxx Xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxx XXXX$XXXXXXX$XXXXXX.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Contains information about the current user preferences.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
This field reads the Windows registry base key HKEY_CURRENT_USER

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxxxx xxxxx xxx Xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxx XXXX$XXXXXXX$XXXX $$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Contains the configuration data for the local machine.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
This field reads the Windows registry base key HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxxxx xxxxx xxx Xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxx XXXX$XXXXX$XXXXXXX.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Contains performance information for software components.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
This field reads the Windows registry base key HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxxxx xxxxx xxx Xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxx XXXX$XXXXXXXXXXX$XXXX.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Contains information about the default user configuration.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
This field reads the Windows registry base key HKEY_USERS.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxxxx xxxxx xxx Xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxx XXXX$XXXXX.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Retrieves the value associated with the specified name, in the specified registry key.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxx.

trans-unit.source: If the name is not found in the specified key, returns a default value that you provide, or null if the specified key does not exist.
trans-unit.target: Xx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxx$ xxxxxxx x xxxxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx$ xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the name/value pair.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxx$xxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The value to return if valueName does not exist.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxxxxx xx $xx$xxxxxXxxx$$xx$ xxxx xxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: null if the subkey specified by keyName does not exist; otherwise, the value associated with valueName, or defaultValue if valueName is not found.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx $xx$xxxXxxx$$xx$ xxxx xxx xxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx $xx$xxxxxXxxx$$xx$$ xx $xx$xxxxxxxXxxxx$$xx$ xx $xx$xxxxxXxxx$$xx$ xx xxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The user does not have the permissions required to read from the registry key.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

\nkeyName does not begin with a valid registry root.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxXxxx$$xx$ xxxx xxx xxxxx xxxx x xxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Sets the specified name/value pair on the specified registry key.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx$xxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxx.

trans-unit.source:
If the specified key does not exist, it is created.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxx xxxxx$ xx xx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the name/value pair.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxx$xxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The value to be stored.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

\nvalue is null.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxxx$$xx$ xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$.

trans-unit.source:
\n

\nkeyName does not begin with a valid registry root.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxXxxx$$xx$ xxxx xxx xxxxx xxxx x xxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
-or-

keyName is longer than the maximum length allowed (255 characters).
trans-unit.target: $$x$$x$x$$xx$$$x$$x$x$$x$xx$xxxXxxx$$xx$ xx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx $000 xxxxxxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The user does not have the permissions required to create or modify registry keys.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Sets the name/value pair on the specified registry key, using the specified registry data type.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxx$xxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxx$ xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
If the specified key does not exist, it is created.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxx xxxxx$ xx xx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the name/value pair.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxx$xxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The value to be stored.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The registry data type to use when storing the data.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

\nvalue is null.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxxx$$xx$ xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$.

trans-unit.source:
keyName does not begin with a valid registry root.

-or-

keyName is longer than the maximum length allowed (255 characters).

-or-

The type of value did not match the registry data type specified by valueKind, therefore the data could not be converted properly.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxXxxx$$xx$ xxxx xxx xxxxx xxxx x xxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x$x$$xx$$$x$$x$x$$x$xx$xxxXxxx$$xx$ xx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx $000 xxxxxxxxxx$.$$x$$x$x$$xx$ $$x$$x$x$Xxx xxxx xx $xx$xxxxx$$xx$ xxx xxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xx $xx$xxxxxXxxx$$xx$$ xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxx xxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The user does not have the permissions required to create or modify registry keys.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx.
